title: The ECG Workbook, 3E- Rowlands [PDF] [StormRG]
description:
TITLE/EDITIONThe ECG Workbook
Author: Angela Rowlands (Author), Andrew Sargent (Author)
Paperback: 108 pages
Publisher: M&K Update Ltd; 3rd Revised edition edition (October 6, 2014)
ISBN-10: 190553986X
ISBN-13: 978-1905539864
Format: Retail PDF
NOTE: this is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book

_____________________________________________________________________________________


A straightforward approach forms the basis of this book that aims to present a systematic approach to ECG interpretation and be digestible to those setting out in this discipline, without the burden of unnecessary jargon. Each step to the systematic approach is presented simply in an A4 format. At the end of each chapter there are a number of activities to help the reader practice what they have just learnt, evaluate their learning and relate their learning to patient scenarios. Answers can be found at the back of the book.
